settings.faq_content_2: We try to keep returns and exchanges as simple as possible.

settings.faq_title_1: How do I place an order?
settings.faq_content_1:
You can place an order via any of the following methods:

  • Online Websitte
  • Physical store
settings.faq_content_2:
1. Fast. Online ordering and check-out gets your order completed quickly and easily.
  2. Accurate Shipping Charges. Shipping costs are added before checkout. Know your total before completing your order.
  3. Peace of mind. Confirmation email is sent after placing your order.
  4. Easy re-ordering. Save your user details for faster future purchases.
  5. Order 24/7. Regardles of the timezone or time of day, you can order online anytime!
settings.faq_content_3: Check out our promotions page for our current discounts and special offers.
settings.faq_title_4: How can I pay for my order?
settings.faq_content_4: All orders placed directly through our online ordering system require credit card payment. Payment options for orders placed by email, fax, or telephone include credit card or an authorized purchase order number. Purchase orders may be paid via credit card, cheque, bank or wire transfer.
